DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 , single-center , open-label study evaluate pharmacokinetics BPO metabolites benzoic acid hippuric acid 7-day repeat application GSK2585823 subject acne vulgaris
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetics Benzoic Acid Hippuric Acid After Topical Administration GSK2585823 Japanese Subjects With Acne Vulgaris
